import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuService } from 'src/app/services/menu.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'], }) export class MenuComponent { constructor(private menuService: MenuService) {} }
